summary: Riccardo Finzi is a private investigator On his first night in town he meets a mysterious girl named Susy, who is later found dead. Convinced of foul play, he and his assistant Giuseppe decide to investigate.
cast: Renato Pozzetto|Olga Karlatos|Silvano Tranquilli|Enzo Cannavale|Simona Mariani|Fausto Di Bella|Elio Zamuto|Adriana Facchetti|Lory Del Santo|Massimo Belli|Franco Caracciolo|Barbara De Bortoli|Maurizio Gueli|Bruno Rosa|Luca Sportelli|Calogero Azzaretto|Angelo Boscariol|Omero Capanna
title: Agenzia Riccardo Finzi... praticamente detective
